boot_profile.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * include this file inside your config.php to get a profiling-overview of your webapp.
00004  * note: you need the xdebug extension
00005  *
00006  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00007  * @package kata_debugging
00008  *
00009  * Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/>
00010  * Copyright 2007-2009 mnt@codeninja.de, gameforge ag
00011  *
00012  * Licensed under The GPL License
00013  * Redistributions of files must retain the above copyright notice.
00014  */
00015 
00016 if (DEBUG > 1) {
00017     if (function_exists('xdebug_start_trace')) {
00018 
00019 /**
00020  * shutdown function to generate profile report 
00021  */
00022         function kataSmallProfile() {
00023             xdebug_stop_trace();
00024             $lines = file($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] . '.xt');
00025             unlink($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] . '.xt');
00026 
00027             array_shift($lines);//version
00028             array_shift($lines);//trace start
00029             array_pop($lines);//exit
00030             array_pop($lines);//trace end
00031             $lastLine = array_pop($lines);//dummy
00032 
00033             $temp = explode("\t",$lines[2]);
00034             $endTime = $temp[3];
00035             $temp = explode("\t",$lastLine);
00036             $totalTime = $temp[3]-$endTime;
00037             unset($temp);
00038 
00039             $callStack = array ();
00040             $outCnt = array();
00041             $out = array ();
00042 
00043             foreach ($lines as $line) {
00044                 $line = explode("\t", $line);
00045 
00046                 if (1 == $line[2]) {
00047                     $retLine = array_pop($callStack);
00048                     if ($retLine[6] == 1) { //user func
00049                         $time = $line[3] - $retLine[3];
00050                         $outCnt[$retLine[5]] = (empty($outCnt[$retLine[5]])?0:$outCnt[$retLine[5]])+1;
00051                         $out[$retLine[5]] = (empty ($out[$retLine[5]]) ? 0 : $out[$retLine[5]]) + $time;
00052                     }
00053                     continue;
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 if (substr($line[8], 0, strlen(ROOT)) != ROOT) {
00057                     continue;
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 if (0 == $line[2]) { // entry
00061                     $callStack[] = $line;
00062                 }
00063             }
00064             arsort($out);
00065 
00066             $tdCell = '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">';
00067             echo '<table style="border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;">';
00068             echo '<tr>'.$tdCell.'What</td>'.$tdCell.'x times</td>'.$tdCell.'ms total</td></tr>';
00069             foreach ($out as $n=>$v) {
00070                 echo '<tr>'.$tdCell.'<pre class="c1">'.$n.'</pre></td>'.$tdCell.$outCnt[$n].'</td>'.$tdCell.$v.' ms</td></tr>';
00071             }
00072             echo "<tr>$tdCell Total (before destroy)</td>$tdCell</td>$tdCell $totalTime ms</td></tr>";
00073             echo '</table>';
00074         }
00075 
00076         register_shutdown_function('kataSmallProfile');
00077         if (!defined('KATATMP')) {
00078             $GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] = ROOT.'tmp'.DS. 'trace' . rand(0, PHP_INT_MAX);
00079         } else {
00080             $GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] = KATATMP . 'trace' . rand(0, PHP_INT_MAX);
00081         }
00082         ini_set('xdebug.trace_format', 1);
00083         xdebug_start_trace($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile']);
00084 
00085     } else {
00086         echo('You need a current XDebug-Extension!');
00087     }
00088 }
